document.full_text: an aide to iran's supreme leader called on president mahmoud ahmadinejad on saturday to "turn back to the main path," suggesting the islamic state's highest power may be losing patience with the head of government.
document.title: iran's khamenei aide calls ahmadinejad to order
lines_and_colors: an aide to iran's supreme leader called on president mahmoud ahmadinejad on saturday to "turn back to the main path," suggesting the islamic state's highest power may be losing patience with the head of government.
